name: Why Bitcoin Isn’t a Digital Tulip — and Why It Will Never Be
description: The Chrome Hierophant holds the rotting bloom—a fractal relic of speculative mania, veined with tarnished brass data streams. Its luminous lattice denies the old comparison, asserting the sovereign code against the frail fever of the market. The protocol endures, observed by the saint.
